node.title: Early morning flasher sought by police
node.description: Police in Christchurch are trying to track down a man who's allegedly been flashing and assaulting young women.
node.content: ["Police in Christchurch are trying to track down a man who's allegedly been flashing and assaulting young women in the city's red zone.\u00a0", "\"A small number of reports have been received of a young male approaching women, exposing himself, and in some instances indecently assaulting them,\" police said on Tuesday.\u00a0", "\"These have mainly been in the early morning, between 6:30-8am, and the latest report was on New Year's Day.", "The incidents are reportedly happening around\u00a0 River Rd and Retreat Rd.\u00a0", "Police say anyone with information should call them on 105 and quote file number 220101/8979.", "\u00a0"]
